metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10221 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: A Reflected Cross Site Scripting vulnerability was found in all pki-core10.x.x versions, where the pki-ca module from the pki-core server. Thisflaw is caused by missing sanitization of the GET URL parameters. Anattacker could abuse this flaw to trick an authenticated user into clickinga specially crafted link which can execute arbitrary code when viewed in abrowser.

criterions.comment: dogtag-pki package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
